entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 06:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -25.6°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -28.8°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
